class  RawMem
 Class holding a memory regions storing the raw representation of a DataPacket. More...

Detailed Description

raw_mem holds memory regions containing a raw representation of a datapacket

Todo:
Up to now only representation of float is possible. Should be enhanced to be a template also being able to deal with double.

raw_mem can hold a memory region, containing either a complete datapacket. It automatically allocates and frees the needed memory.
